long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PropyC Translater is the extension for everyone who use English-Thai language and didn't realize while you're typing that it's wrong. This extension you can simply select your text then right-clicked after that you click -Translate- That's all you need to do then you got the right language. this project is for innovation class in our school. Thanks for reading our description. We will always update our extension for all user experiences.
